content.content: Hello, I wanna ask if marston bailiffs have the legal right to demand payment for debts? Thanks for the reply,

This is unusual for the Maker Forum  I’m not British, but was interested in what this was so I Googled it. Here’s a link you might find useful:    Creditfix    Marston Bailiffs - Creditfix If a debt collector or bailiff gets in touch with you looking for money, it can be upsetting, particularly if you’ve never heard of them before, and aren’t sure of your rights. That’s why we’ve created this creditor directory. It includes key...      Good luck with your situation - hope it’s not too bad.

I think the bailiffs’ rights only depend on the rules of their company to allow them, you have right to complaint if bailiff treated you badly… read here https://www.scottishtrustdeed.co.uk/creditor-details/marston-debt-collection/
